string.name: rich_text
string.value:
1. Local new live features, exciting content, wait for you to see

2. The product details page has been upgraded, from the interface to a more interactive shopping experience

3. added the scan function to enrich user experience

4. added video playback function, picture-in-picture function

5. added sharing function

6. added video like function

7. added video following function

8. added video favorites function

9. added positioning function
